alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 5:42PM CDT until May 19 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Garland County in central Arkansas... Central Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 541 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Meyers, or 16 miles west of Hot Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Mountain Pine... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Meyers... Lofton... Rockwell... Hot Springs National Park... Red Oak... Oaklawn Racetrack... Sunshine... Royal... Gulpha Gorge... Pettyview... Hempwallace... Pearcy... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
